text: Pen ned Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb ak ma yek ñɨn ak, binɨb okok kɨli takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak sek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok takaw tɨkɨlak ak sek nɨŋɨd, adek anɨb ak gel amolɨgup agak. Pen Jon owak ñɨn ak, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ak takaw teplep anɨb ak agelak binɨb mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd, kɨles tɨmel gɨl mɨgan anɨb ak amnun agɨl gel ameb agak.
